price: Kim Allahla qarşılaşmağa ümid edirsə, (bilsin ki,) Allahın təyin etdiyi o vaxt mütləq gələcək. O, Eşidəndir, Biləndir.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
